AI Description: pydicom is a Python library for working with DICOM files and data. It provides tools for reading, modifying, and writing DICOM files, as well as accessing DICOM data elements and metadata.
Core Features: Read, Write, & Modify Dicom Files, Access Dicom Data Elements & Metadata, Support For Various Dicom Sop Classes & Transfer Syntaxes, Integration With Other Scientific Python Libraries
General Tags: Python Library, Dicom Data, Medical Imaging
